
# Project Title

Zscrum :- A project management solution 


## Screenshots

![ Screenshot](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/51760520/373491720-783d4f3b-925d-44cf-aaf8-4ee4035b2f6c.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VNXjLae-8Zy7RhV5CBuSu28VQnrUpMjsFGQi7UKU4Sk)


## Features

- Intuitive Kanban Boards
- Powerful Sprint Planning
- Comprehensive Reporting
- customizable workflows, time tracking
- team collaboration tools


## Tech Stack

**Client:** NextJs, TailwindCSS, React-hook-form

**language:** Javascript


**Database:** Postgress

**ORM:** Prisma




## Run Locally

Clone the project

```bash
  git clone https://github.com/Sandeshjadhav22/scrum.git
```

Go to the project directory

```bash
  cd scrum
```

Install dependencies

```bash
  npm install
```

Start the server

```bash
  npm run dev
```


## Environment Variables

To run this project, you will need to add the following environment variables to your .env file

`DATABASE_URL=`

`NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY=`

`CLERK_SECRET_KEY=`

`NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_SIGN_IN_URL=/sign-in`

`NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_SIGN_UP_URL=/sign-up`

`NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_AFTER_SIGN_IN_URL=/onboarding`

`NEXT_PUBLIC_CLERK_AFTER_SIGN_UP_URL=/onboarding`
